page.title: 05PLAYGROUND GAMES IN ALVES
page.content: The most popular playground games that my friends and I play are 'Joined Tig' 'Skipping' and 'Stick in the Mud'.The game that is played most by girls is skipping.We use a long piece of rope with one person turning each end of it.Somebody jumps in and starts to skip. When that person stops the rope , somebody else goes in. Another game girls play is Joined Tig. To play this game one girl stands in the middle of the playground and then she tries to catch somebody. When she does they both hold hands and try to catch someone else. This will carry on until there are four people standing in a row and then they will split into two pairs. The first one caught starts the game again.
